title: Fujifilm F800EXR 16MP Digital Camera with 20x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch TFT LCD, Black
description: The FinePix F800EXR boasts the exceptional performance of Fujifilm's EXR CMOS II image sensor with low noise, plus high speed start up, AF, and shot to shot capability. The FUJINON 20X Optical Zoom lens provides outstanding clarity and close-up action. A large 3-Inch LCD display, 1080 Full HD Movie, HDMI output, and Advanced Photographic Filters plus lots more add to the creative and performance features. Combined with these high performance attributes is the convenience of the new 2nd generation Wireless Image Transfer feature that allows instant wireless transfer of images captured on your F800EXR to practically any Smartphone or Tablet device.Document your journeys in fabulous photos!Thanks to enhanced WLAN connectivity, the FinePix F800EXR can read location information directly from your smartphone. Combined with on-board POI(Points Of Interest) database and geo-tagging functions, location information helps you find your way and document your travels with high-quality photos.
